ygData.subject: Onyx in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: ok I ve been working on my jewelry skill last night and I m just done maxing it out with bloodstone ( skill 26 ). the next stone to work with from what I read
ygData.messageBody:
ok I've been working on my jewelry skill last night and I'm just done maxing
it out with bloodstone ( skill 26 ). the next stone to work with from what I
read is Onyx but I cant find it in Freeport. so maybe I should jump directly
to the next one ( dont remember what it is ). I need advice here. if I jump
to the next one, I'm afraid I'm gonna fail a lot and ruin my ( already tiny
) bank account. Is it worth the trip to another city ( like erudin ) to find
onyx?
Thanks.
Skara.
